title: The area of such center shall be allowed free of FSI equivalent to 2(two) percent of the total BUA for every building distributed as desired
clause_text: The area of such center shall be allowed free of FSI equivalent to 2(two) percent of the total BUA for every building distributed as desired. Any additional BUA, in excess of this limit would be counted towards FSI.
